properties.title: Hippo Channel Manager Page Management Support

section.name: Hippo Channel Manager Page Management Support
section.p: This project provides some add-on features to handle PageCopyEvent which is propagated when a page is being copied from a channel.

subsection.name: DocumentCopyingPageCopyEventListener component
subsection.p: org.onehippo.forge.channelmanager.pagesupport.channel.event.DocumentCopyingPageCopyEventListener component copies linked documents from the source channel to the target channel on the event of page copying in the channel manager.

subsection.name: Demo Application with Hippo CMS 10
subsection.p: You can check out, build and run demo application, which contains all the examples explained in this site documentation.
Here are example commands to check out, build and run demo application:

div.source: $ svn checkout https://forge.onehippo.org/svn/channel-pagesup/channel-pagesup-demo/trunk channel-pagesup-demo-TRUNK $ cd channel-pagesup-demo-TRUNK $ mvn clean verify $ mvn -P cargo.run
